cards.teacher_script: Our Power Word is MISHPAT! Can you say it? Mishpat! It means 'justice' or 'fairness.' This whole parasha is called Mishpatim - that's the plural! It's full of rules about how to be fair. The Torah says these are the mishpatim - the fair rules - to follow. When we do mishpat, we treat everyone the right way!
